definition: to regret/to feel that it is a great pity/to feel sorry for sb
to sigh in regret or pity/Taiwan pr. [wan4]

sentences.english: All of them are also sympathized about their friends in other schools who did not receive such materials.
sentences.chinese: 他們對其他學校沒有得到這些物品感動惋惜。

sentences.english: I feel no sorry for it at all.
sentences.chinese: 我對此一點也不感到惋惜。

sentences.english: The prisoner felt sorry for him, but there was nothing else he could do.
sentences.chinese: 戰俘爲他感到惋惜，但卻沒有別的選擇。

sentences.english: I really mourn the loss of that gold watch.
sentences.chinese: 我真爲失掉那塊金錶惋惜。

sentences.english: His regret is echoed on the African continent.
sentences.chinese: 他的這種惋惜在非洲大陸也有迴響。

sentences.english: The government has rounded on the European Union, which expressed its dismay at Mr Zapata's death.
sentences.chinese: 古巴政府指責歐盟表達對於薩帕塔死的惋惜。

sentences.english: An end, often need entities for party fails to show words meaning of the poor.
sentences.chinese: 一種結局，常需存有惋惜方顯言盡意未窮的回味。

sentences.english: Sorry to say that his father died from an accident last month.
sentences.chinese: 我很惋惜地報告大衆他的父親上月因車禍而正逝世了。

sentences.english: But I feel so sorry, about your vast and mighty anabasis being such a beautiful mistake.
sentences.chinese: 只是我惋惜，你浩蕩的遠征，是個美麗的錯誤。

sentences.english: The manager announced his resignation and everybody mourned.
sentences.chinese: 經理宣佈了他的辭職，大家都感到惋惜。

sentences.english: I sometimes regretted that I was not handsomer;
sentences.chinese: 有時，我爲自己沒有長得更漂亮感到惋惜。

sentences.english: Chinese fans were vocal in lamenting Yao's departure.
sentences.chinese: 中國球迷表達了對姚明退役的惋惜。

sentences.english: because I feel just really sorry for them.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我爲哈佛的學生感到惋惜。

sentences.english: “I kind of felt sorry for him,” Rajeev said.
sentences.chinese: “我有點替他感到惋惜，”拉傑夫說。

sentences.english: So repentance is more than feeling sorry.
'I can't inject anything to take it away,' Brandt says sadly.
sentences.chinese: “我不能注射任何東西來拿掉它，”布蘭德惋惜地說。

definition: to wring one's hands (literally wring one's wrists)
to feel distressed about sth/heartache/cardiac pain
to sigh with sorrow, regret etc/rueful/deeply moved
helpless/without choice/for lack of better option/grudgingly/willy-nilly/nolens volens/abbr. for 無可奈何|无可奈何[wu2 ke3 nai4 he2]
